posts.post_title: FS: T206 Baker, Duffy, Tinker - All PSA
posts.post_content:
I currently have the following for sale:

T206 Home Run Baker, Piedmont, PSA 4 - $200
T206 Duffy, Sweet Caporal, PSA 3.5 - **SOLD, thanks Frank**
T206 Tinker, Bat on Shoulder, PSA 4 - $200

Prices include delivery with signature confirmation.  Front and back scans of all are below.  Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like any.  Paypal fine with no additional surcharge.

Regards,
Adam

Hello Adam

I will take the Duffy if you still have it available.

Thanks

Frank L.
